attributes.action: Change rules so that small cats and dogs are allowed in airplane cabins
attributes.background:
Currently government rules state pets aren't allowed in airplane cabins when flying into the UK, except guidance or assistance dogs.

I want Parliament to introduce a law that allows all vaccinated cats and dogs that can fit under airplane seats and that weigh 10kg or under in airline cabins.
